channel.title: Course Modules on Greek for the Roman Seminarian
channel.description: Recent content in Course Modules on Greek for the Roman Seminarian

item.title: Pronunciation
item.description: Overview # See Boler Chapter 1 (p.5) Greek Α ἄλφα alpha /a/, /aː/ /a/ as in father Β βῆτα beta /b/ /b/ as in boy Γ γάμμα gamma /ɡ/ /g/ as in girl Δ δέλτα delta /d/ /d/ as in dog Ε εἶ, later ἐ ψιλόν epsilon /eː/ /e/ as in pet Ζ ζῆτα zeta /zd/ sd as in wisdom Η ἦτα eta /h/, /ɛː/ /e/ as in they [more precisely /ɛː/ as in French fête] Θ θῆτα theta /tʰ/ /th/ as in thought
